attributes.review:
So I got this app to like 100% like vote for bunker boy! But as soon as I opened the app it called me fat and ugly. They threatened to kill my dog if I don’t vote! I’m underaged! I can’t vote :( 
So then the KIDDNAPPED ME for 69 days and 420 minutes. They your tires me by saying “Trump 2020” while repeatedly playing ‘Sorry’ by Justin Beiber on repeat. I know have permanent hearing loss. 
After I escaped by digging a whole through the wall with a pocky stick I ran back to my family who were very relieved to see me. 
We tried calling the cops but our phone lines were cut. I saw a guy in a trump mask staring at me thought he window so we had to leave. We grabbed out stuff and got outside but outside was massive mob of people in Trump masks with pitchforks and torches yelling ’TRUMP 2020’ 
we managed our way intoth act and pulled out of the driveway, they set out the house on fire and chased us down the road 20 miles. We are now in hiding please help.
👄💅🏽💅🏽

For legal reasons tho is a joke

attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: first things first, I downloaded this app because my fellow trump supporters onna gram and twitter harassed me to get it to vote for him even tho I’m UNDERAGE. however OBVIOUSLY I hadddd to get it, that was on sunday January 3rd. so i open the app and a duck shaped cheeto pops up on my screen, I got so scared that my dog and I flew across the entire earth (I just got here btw). while I was flying I saw so many weirdly shaped planets which were nothing like how our science teachers make it seem. first I saw a big dog shaped planet that played the song: Martha✊was😺an💀average😧dog🐶she🙊said🩳ruff🧶and🧟‍♀️erf🧔🏻and👄ruuuuuuuuuuuuuuuufffffff🥵 then I saw my granny sitting in her chair singing r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️  i don’t think I can keep going because of the other many scary things I saw out there (for example trumps raisin dried up p- nvm I think that’s enough. anyways I have made the easiest decision I have ever made in my entire 15 years of living, deleting this app. I will continue to pray for the people who have gone thru the same thing as me. you are not alone girl😹✊🏼
attributes.title: four in her😍😍

attributes.review:
with all this sh*t going on with the “black lives matter” sensitive snowflake babies, i wanted to do something to support MY PRESIDENT‼️
 i “downloaded” this app to find out what i could do to help make SURE he stays RIGHTFULLY in office. after opening this app i got a “VERY STRANGE” message!! it was all in a weird “carona” (FAKE) language! I looked it up and you will NOT believe what the translation was😤‼️🙄  it WAS “CHINA TALK” AND SAID “IT WAS TAKING ACCESS OF MY PERSONAL INFORMATION”!!‼️ 
i CANNOT BELIEVE DONALD TRUMP, MY LORD AND SAVIOR!! WOULD IS WORKING WITH THOSE TRADERS!!!! 
i did NOT delete my app because i still wanted to make sure no “dem*cr*t” 🤮 made it “into office” “AND” i will always support Trump 2020 🤩‼️
WELL... the “app”? it completely RUINED my life😭 i can’t do ANYTHING on my phone anymore!!! everything shuts down when i try to “use” it and starts saying weird china talk ! DO NOT DOWNLOAD unless you want to “ruin your life”
TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
